actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the estate tax exemption from $60,000 to $100,000.

summary.text: Increases, under the Internal Revenue Code, the amount of the estate tax exemption from $60,000 to $100,000. Makes this Act effective with respect to the estates of decedents dying after the date of enactment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the estate tax exemption from $60,000 to $100,000.
